get.description: Returns information about Hypixel Games. This endpoint is in early development and we are working to add more information when possible HypixelDev/PublicAPI#197

games.description: A map where the key is the backend name of the game

get.description: Information regarding the current bingo event and its goals.

end.description: The end time of the current bingo event in unix milliseconds

goals.description: The goals for the current bingo event, as well as their progress

fullLore.description: The full description of this goal

id.description: The backend ID for this goal

name.description: The user friendly display name for this goal

progress.description: The global progress of this goal

requiredAmount.description: The required amount for this specific goal

tiers.description: The tiers of this goal, if a global goal

id.description: The current bingo event ID, increments by 1 for each bingo hosted

lastUpdated.description: The unix milliseconds timestamp of the last time this data was updated

modifier.description: The modifier for the current bingo event

name.description: The display name for the current bingo event

start.description: The start time of the current bingo event in unix milliseconds

get.description: Information regarding Collections in the SkyBlock game.
Information regarding the current mayor and ongoing election in SkyBlock.

current.description: Data regarding the current election, will not be provided if there is no open election ongoing

get.description: Information regarding items in the SkyBlock game.
Information regarding skills in the SkyBlock game.
Returns the auctions selected by the provided query. Only one query parameter can be used in a single request, and cannot be filtered by multiple.

parameters.description: The auction UUID that you wish to request
parameters.name: uuid

parameters.description: The player UUID that you wish to request
parameters.name: player

parameters.description: The profile UUID that you wish to request
parameters.name: profile

get.summary: Request auction(s) by the auction UUID, player UUID, or profile UUID.
